question_text:
Question 10
During the process of hydration of cement, due to increase in Dicalcium Silicate 
2
(C S)
  content in cement
clinker, the heat of hydration
(A) increases

explanation_text:
Sol. 
Due to increase in 
2
C S
  heat of hydration decreases.
